definition: large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams
threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout

sentences.english: He has invested some of the income from his increased crops in a small pig farm.
sentences.chinese: 部分種地賺得的錢還投資辦了一個小型養豬場。

sentences.english: Triple oxidation ditch was used to treat anaerobically digested effluent of piggery wastewater.
sentences.chinese: 研究了T型氧化溝工藝對豬場糞水厭氧出水處理。

sentences.english: Piggery managers keep records of sow and boar performance in a book or computer program.
sentences.chinese: 豬場管理員會把母豬和公豬記錄在本上或者電腦裏。

sentences.english: The large-scale pig farm with power generation netting will be the tide.
sentences.chinese: 大型豬場施行沼氣併網發電是未來的發展方向。

sentences.english: The case part, selected the Huhhot standardization pig farm as an example.
sentences.chinese: 案例部分，選取了呼和浩特市標準化豬場改擴建項目。

sentences.english: In some places, there even occurred the pig farms demolition events.
sentences.chinese: 因此，一些地方甚至出現了強拆豬場的事件。

sentences.english: In fact, the pollutant in the piggery waste water is the resources which has been put in the wrong position.
sentences.chinese: 豬場廢水中的污染物本質上是放錯位置的資源。

sentences.english: Piggery wastewater is a significant agricultural pollutant resources.
sentences.chinese: 養豬場廢水是農業重大污染源。

sentences.english: Mr. Wang found a good location for a pigs' farm.
sentences.chinese: 王先生找到了一片建造豬場的好地方。

sentences.english: Hog farm, Manzanar Relocation Center, California.
sentences.chinese: 養豬場，Manzanar搬遷中心，加利福尼亞州。

sentences.english: Many farm start to use PRRS vaccine to control the disease.
sentences.chinese: 很多豬場病急亂投醫，胡亂地使用PRRS疫苗。

sentences.english: Is Ding Lei in the hoggery of lake city?
The breeding pig farm of the company is the council member of the All China Mechanic Pig Raising Association.
sentences.chinese: 該公司種豬場是全國機械化養豬協會理事單位。

sentences.english: Therefore, composting can enhance fertilizer effect and utility value of the piggery waste.
sentences.chinese: 因此，堆肥化能提高豬場廢棄物肥效和利用價值。

sentences.english: Nanchong pig farm did not suffer any loss during the earthquake.
sentences.chinese: 南充某豬場在此次地震中未受損失。

definition: (jocularly) public building that has been lying idle (and is thus ideal for housing mosquitos) (Tw)
